page.title: 16Population Growth
page.content: The population of Stevenage is growing faster than the average for England and Wales. This is because as a new town it has a young population. Stevenage has a big housing problem because the younger people are getting married and need houses. To provide extra houses, new areas are being built. One of these is called Poplars, providing homes for 3500 people. We spoke to some people who live in Poplars and they said that the houses are pleasant but the gardens are small. At the moment it is very muddy and the pavements are uneven, the houses are modern but crammed together. Poplars is very quiet because there is not much traffic and not too many people have moved in yet.
